title: Aviary
description: Design a bird! It can be realistic or imaginary (and it doesn’t actually need to fly).

title: Ball Launcher
description: Design a machine to throw a small plastic ball as accurately as possible.

title: Ball Thrower
description: Design a machine to throw a small plastic ball as far as possible.

title: Can Do
description: Create a device that is able to grab and lift an empty soda can!

title: Clean Sweep
description: Create a sweeper to clear the floor of LEGO bricks or other small LEGO pieces. Any type of device is fine — broom, plow, vacuum — as long as it gets the floor clean.

title: Creepy Crawly
description: Make a creepy crawly—a worm, a bug, a spider, or any creepy-crawly creature.

title: Future Furniture
description: Make an exciting and useful piece of automated furniture that you would like to have!

title: Monster
description: For this monstrous challenge, create a SPIKE Prime monster. It can be big or small, scary or funny—but it must respond to its environment in some way.

title: Morning Helper
description: Getting up in the morning can be hard! Create a device to make mornings a little easier—a cool alarm clock, a toothpaste squeezer, or whatever you wish

title: Party Time
description: Make a robot that will bring the party to any room you enter! Be creative with music, movement, and more!

title: Percussion Playtime
description: Clash clang boom bang! Create a percussion instrument for a band. Drums, cymbals, xylophone, bells—any type of percussion instrument is welcome.

title: Puppet Show
description: Create any sort of puppet that moves using the SPIKE Prime.

title: Ramp Climbing Car
description: Build a car that can climb as steep a ramp as possible.

title: RoboChef
description: Everyone could use a hand with food preparation. Create a robot that helps you cook. It can do a single task, such as stirring a pot, or a complex operation, such as making a sandwich.

title: Simple Car
description: Build a sturdy car using as few pieces as possible. Your robot needs to be able to drive forward for two seconds, backwards for two seconds, spin right for 2 seconds, and spin left for 2 seconds.

title: Space Exploration
description: Blast off on a space adventure! Create a rocket ship, a tool for a space traveler, or even an alien being—there are no limits to this cosmic journey.

title: Time Keeper
description: It is easy to lose track of time. Create a timekeeping device to help you count the minutes—a clock, an hourglass, a pendulum—or any other way of keeping track of time.

title: Trophy
description: Make a trophy to celebrate an accomplishment you’re proud of: learning to ride a bike, taking care of a pet, preparing a meal, etc. Your trophy should use movement and/or sound to show what you achieved.

title: Under the Sea
description: You are going on a deep-sea dive. Show what you discover on your undersea adventure. A strange fish? An exotic plant? A never-before-seen creature of the deep?

title: Greetings Earthings
description: Build a robot that greets people with a wave, a fist bump, a high five, or some other welcoming movement!

title: Pet Sitter
description: Build a device to help you take care of an animal. It can be any animal—use your imagination!

title: Silly Walks
description: Build a robot that moves forwards – without using wheels!

title: Tricky-Food Utencil
description: Some foods can be difficult to eat — Peas. Wonton Soup. Masala Dosa. Grapefruit. Spaghetti. Invent a utensil to help you eat a food you find tricky.

title: Human Plus
description: Create a device to improve human capabilities—an arm that can reach high shelves, eyes that determine color—or whatever improvement you can imagine.

title: Ski Lift
description: LEGO Ski Mountain needs a new ski lift! Make an automated mechanism to transport LEGO people up a slope. Control the lift with a sensor and make its cycle finish at the starting position.

title: Tools For School
description: Make a tool to aid you at school—a robotic pencil holder, a calculator, a lunch box—whatever you think will help make you a successful scholar.

title: Word Cup
description: Make a robot that plays in a soccer match.
